com.ibm.util.merge.data

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.util.merge.data.DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The data manager provides a path based interface to the Data Element structure
    Author:
    Mike Storey

    • Method Detail

      • contians

        public boolean contians(java.lang.String address,
                        java.lang.String delimiter)
        Test if Data Manager has an element at the provide address
        Parameters:
        address - The address to lookup
        delimiter - The delimiter used in the address
        Returns:
        true if the manager contains the element

      • get

        public DataElement get(java.lang.String address,
                       java.lang.String delimiter)
                throws MergeException
        Get a value from the data manager based on the provided address
        Parameters:
        address - The address to lookup
        delimiter - The delimiter used in the address
        Returns:
        the data element
        Throws:
        MergeException - when no context exists

      • put

        public void put(java.lang.String address,
                java.lang.String delimiter,
                DataElement value)
         throws MergeException
        Add a value to the Data Manager. Note that the data manager provides a loss-less approach to adding values. If the value already exists as a non-list element it will converted to a list and this value added to that list.
        Parameters:
        address - The address to put
        delimiter - The delimiter used in the address
        value - The data to put in the manager
        Throws:
        MergeException - on processing errors

      • put

        public void put(java.lang.String address,
                java.lang.String delimiter,
                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> parameterMap)
         throws MergeException
        Convenience method to add the HTTP Request Parameters to the data manager
        Parameters:
        address - The address where the object is to be put
        delimiter - The delimiter used in the address
        parameterMap - A HTTP Request Parameters object (Map of String,String[])
        Throws:
        MergeException - on processing errors

      • put

        public void put(java.lang.String address,
                java.lang.String delimiter,
                java.lang.String value)
         throws MergeException
        Convenience method to add a primitive value
        Parameters:
        address - The address where the object is to be put
        delimiter - The delimiter used in the address
        value - The value to put
        Throws:
        MergeException - when errors occur

      • put

        public void put(Path path,
                DataElement value)
         throws MergeException
        Convenience method to add a value with the default path separator
        Parameters:
        path - Path to use
        value - Value to put
        Throws:
        MergeException - on processing errors

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns:
        size of base entry set
